name: IRE-01
description:
IRE-01 is a game about binary; 1's and 0's; truths and falsities.

Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.

PLAY FULL SCREEN

Controls:
Click on the various environmental interactables to stop the 0's from reaching the end of the binary portal.

The truth will set you free...

or will it?
